formattedAddress: 38 Peck Slip, New York, NY 10038, USA
adrFormatAddress: 38 Peck Slip, New York, NY 10038, USA

editorialSummary.text: Pet food & accessories store with organic products as well as day-care & grooming services.

originalText.text: I can’t recommend seaport paw highly enough!! May is incredible and the only person I trust with my bernedoodle! We’ve been taking our pup here since her first haircut, and they are super accommodating especially when I need to squeeze a trim around the eyes. She knows exactly how I like her cut and always manages to keep her looking like a teddy bear even when it’s time for her summer haircuts!

text.text: I can’t recommend seaport paw highly enough!! May is incredible and the only person I trust with my bernedoodle! We’ve been taking our pup here since her first haircut, and they are super accommodating especially when I need to squeeze a trim around the eyes. She knows exactly how I like her cut and always manages to keep her looking like a teddy bear even when it’s time for her summer haircuts!

originalText.text: Walked in for nail trimming and it was done smoothly & swiftly at a reasonable price. My dog also loved the yogurt sorbet afterwards. Justin at the front desk was really nice and accommodating. Can’t wait to book more appointments for my pup here.

text.text: Walked in for nail trimming and it was done smoothly & swiftly at a reasonable price. My dog also loved the yogurt sorbet afterwards. Justin at the front desk was really nice and accommodating. Can’t wait to book more appointments for my pup here.

originalText.text:
Absolutely livid, they butchered my pup’s ears. Before & after photos below.

I took my cavalier spaniel for three specific services: sanitary trim (underbelly), paw pad trim, and nail trim. I specifically told the staff I didn’t want the ears touched. He asked if I wanted them cleaned, I said I didn’t want them cleaned or cut (so they were told twice).

I picked up the pup to see his ears had an inch trimmed off in jagged, uneven cuts. It is clearly lopsided. It looks absolutely dreadful and will take months to grow back.

When I pay $100+ for a trim (no bath, just the trim) my lowest expectation is that my requests are listened to. When I called to explain our dissatisfaction, I was given no remedy other than a quick apology for the miscommunication. I had to return in person to demand a refund.

Absolutely will not go back. Do better.

When I pay $100+ for a trim (no bath, just the trim) my lowest expectation is that my requests are listened to. When I called to explain our dissatisfaction, I was given no remedy other than a quick apology for the miscommunication. I had to return in person to demand a refund.

originalText.text: May is the absolute best! I have a rescue dog with significant health issues, and there is no one else I'd trust with her grooming care. May is so careful of her needs and so thoughtful in her approach - she really takes the time to get to know my dog and make the right plan for her. My dog is always happy, healthy, and very cute after her groom, and I'm incredibly grateful.

originalText.text: Seaport paw is amazing and offers top notch services.  It’s owner May is dedicated to providing each pet with a wonderful experience. My pup Luna loves to go there just to say hi!  The location of the store is in an area with hundreds of dogs. They are always very busy and handle the demand with ease and quality service. I would recommend trying them out.
